<label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_schoolYear">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('schoolYear', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('schoolYear') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_level">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('level', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('level') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_school">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('school', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('school') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_type">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('type', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('type') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_duration">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('duration', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('duration') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_startDate">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('startDate', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('startDate') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_endDate">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('endDate', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('endDate') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_searchDate">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('searchDate', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('searchDate') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_jobtype">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('jobtype', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('jobtype') #if ($context.display == 'edit') ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_offersSent">$doc.display('offersSent')$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('offersSent', false, false))</label> #else ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_offersSent">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('offersSent', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('offersSent') #end ; <label for="Internships.InternshipsClass_0_content1">$escapetool.xml($doc.displayPrettyName('content1', false, false))</label> : $doc.display('content1') ))) {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
